Characteristics: Kalieniczensko took live or six teaspoonfuls of an infusion of Phallus in twenty-four hours, and the symptoms of the Schema are the effects observed. There is a general resemblance to the effect of the Agarici
vertigo, disordered vision, gastro-enteric disturbance and viscid sweat.
Head: Vertigo.
Eyes: Objects seem coloured grey, as in smoke.
Throat: Great dryness of throat, with irritation as from black pepper.
Urinary Organs: Urine deep red, depositing a sediment of urates of lime and soda.
Fever: After four days all the pores became opened, profuse viscid perspiration.
